body_html:
OK. @Jorghi12 can you modify .travis.yml to add another build configuration where it applies all of the ROCM diffs, and fails if they don't apply cleanly? You can skip this if we're supposed to be getting the AMD CI online in the very short future.

FYI, I think a decent number of patches are going to start tripping over AMD specific code and/or make these patches stop applying. We're going to need clear guidance about what to do in this situation (whether or not it's blocking the PR until you get around to it, or educating developers enough about the AMD stack so they can fix it themselves, or temporarily disabling functionality if it gets out of sync.)
